body:
We are happy to announce our COVID19 ready Winery/Distillery* Tour! 

This tour will pick you up in Santa Barbara and take you to three wineries in the Santa Ynez Valley as well as a working olive oil farm. Tasting fees not included. 

\*Choose either one distillery and two winery visits or three winery visits.

We are following strict cleanliness guidelines and will arrive to pick up your party in a fully sanitized vehicle with extra wipes, hand sanitizer, and gloves for all.  Guests are required to bring their own masks.
priceLong:
1-2 guests-$300

3-4 guests-$400

5-8 guests-$600

9-12 guests-$800

Call or email to book the tour or if you have any questions.
timeLong:
10:30 am start time

4:00 pm end time
title: COVID19 Ready -  Winery/Distillery* Tour
